content_html: Bhaktapur, Sept 17: The National Examinations Board (NEB) is to conduct the Class 12 supplementary examinations on September 23 and 24. The supplementary examinations were earlier scheduled for September 13 and 14, but had to be rescheduled due to the present difficult situation on the country, NEB stated. The first
